h6.span: Welcome to Salem City School District

span.span: The Salem City School District will be a high-performance district as demonstrated by the Salem City students who: Exceed state standards in literacy and computation, develop intrinsic motivation to pursue education in and outside of the classroom setting, master the skills necessary to retrieve and analyze information, and become lifelong learners.

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

strong.span:
Attention Salem RAM Family, all SCSD schools closed beginning Tuesday, 3/17 until further directive from New Jersey Governor Murphy.
Governor Phil Murphy
@GovMurphy
· April 16, 2020
Our public schools will remain closed through at least Friday, May 15th. We need to be guided by where the facts on the ground, science, and public health take us. That means it will not be safe to reopen our schools for at least another four weeks.

a.title: NJ DOE Covid-19
a.span: State of New Jersey Department of Education

span.style: font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
text-align: center; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0); font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

a.title: Covid-19 - Revised School Closure 4-9-20
a.span:
Instructional Packets information, for students
NOT on Google Classroom

span.style: background-color: rgb(146, 208, 80); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

a.title: Online Resources for Students & Parents
a.span: GOOGLE CLASSROOM & Online Resources for Parents

span.style: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

span.br: UPDATE for all SCSD students NOT working on Google classroom for Phase II. All students, if possible must be using Google classroom for all assignments during Covid-19 school closing.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-align: center;
p.span:
SHS: Drop-off of completed work & Pick-up of the next set of Instructional Packets is
Friday, April 24, curbside, as follows:
9th grade - 8 am to 9 am
10th grade - 9 am to 10 am
11th grade - 10 am to 11 am
12th grade - 11 am to 12 pm
See the attached memo from Mr. Mulhorn for more information.
SMS: Drop-off of completed work & Pick-up of next set of Instructional Packets is Friday, April 24, from 8 am to 12 noon in the SMS GYMNASIUM - Wesley Street entrance.
JFA: Drop-off of completed work & Pick-up of the next set of Instructional Packets will be Friday, April 24, from 8 am to 12 noon in the JFA Cafeteria.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);
font-size: 14px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);
text-align: center; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);
span.span: RAM FAMILY, we are very excited to announce our

br.span: Monday, April 20 on our school website & our social media platforms.

br.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);
span.span: traditions are taking on a different form this year, and this will be an opportunity for our RAM Family to meet the
, learn about their accomplishments and their future plans, and to share our blessings with them.

br.style: color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);

div.span: The Fresh Fruit & Vegetable Program (FFVP) is a federally assisted program that provides

span.style: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; font-family: Arial;

div.span: FREE, FRESH fruits & vegetables to students in elementary schools which are selected by the government through an application process each year. We are proud to announce that John Fenwick Academy & Salem Middle School are recipients of the FFVP.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12.8px; text-align: left;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

span.br:
Photos & service records alphabetically
& by graduation year from SHS.

a.title: IBWSC
a.span: IBWSC Global Action Team - Global Citizenship

br.span: Salem High School is proud to offer our students the International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme. Read the latest findings regarding the success of IB Diploma Programme students --

strong.em: Facts & Figures The Diploma Programme Around the World

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; text-align: center;
strong.span: U.S. universities evaluate academic grades in the context of a student's high school curriculum and its degree of rigour. The two-year IB Diploma Program is widely regarded as an academically demanding syllabus, and one that provides excellent preparation for college level coursework --
